title: The Midnight Cellar
location: Market Ward -> The Velvet Flagon Tavern
description: The Velvet Flagon Tavern has started opening a secret back room after midnight for a select clientele. The Ward Warden suspects it's an unlicensed Void-Wine operation and asks you to confirm the rumours before she can act officially.

turns.narrative: You visit the Velvet Flagon at normal hours. It seems entirely ordinary — good ale, a card game in the corner, a young bard playing quietly. But you notice the barmaid tapping a specific rhythm on the counter when certain customers arrive, who then disappear through a curtained alcove.
turns.choice_a: Attempt to follow a customer through the curtain
turns.consequence_a: A large man blocks your way politely but firmly. You are not one of the regulars.
turns.choice_b: Approach the barmaid and ask what's behind the curtain
turns.consequence_b: She tenses immediately and claims it's the owner's private office. Her pulse is visible at her throat.

turns.narrative: You need a way in. The back-room regulars seem to be upper-middle-class citizens — merchants, junior officials, a physician. None of them look like addicts. They look... hopeful.
turns.choice_a: Dress up as a merchant and ask Brel directly, dropping hints you've heard about his 'special cellar'
turns.consequence_a: Brel looks you over carefully for thirty seconds, then nods slowly and lets you in.
turns.choice_b: Stake out the alley behind the tavern and follow a customer when they leave
turns.consequence_b: A woman exits via the alley two hours later. She is glassy-eyed and serene. You search her bag and find a receipt for 'V.W. — Half Measure.'

turns.narrative: Inside the back room you find a small, tasteful lounge where a man measures Void-Wine in tiny gilded cups, explaining it relieves grief and chronic pain. No one appears in immediate danger, but the operation is unlicensed and the wine's source is unknown.
turns.choice_a: Arrest Brel and shut the back room immediately
turns.consequence_a: Brel is arrested. His customers are deeply unhappy. Warden Astrid is satisfied.
turns.choice_b: Report your findings first and let Astrid plan a coordinated investigation of the supply chain
turns.consequence_b: Astrid chooses a controlled sting operation rather than a hasty arrest. Better intelligence is gathered.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
